alert.note: Alert for White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:21AM EDT until April 05 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... White County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1021 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Remington, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wolcott around 1025 AM EDT. Monon around 1035 AM EDT. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 193 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
